channel.title: I need urgent help!
channel.description:
Somebody keeps logging onto my server, impersonating admins & mods. He has been IP Banned, but he still gets on. And requests to be Admin. How can I stop him?
Also, is there a way to STOP certain characters, (EG: / - . , ) from being used during registration? So Abcd. Woudln't be allowed, but Acbd would?
Please help, this is extremely urgent!

item.title: I need urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @AndyJay123 AndyJay123
item.description:
@AndyJay123 wrote:

Ok, I’ve got the actual IP Ban working. But I need the “IPBan” Command to write the player’s IP into the BannedIPs.txt file.
< Need help with that.

Also, Im using Project Czar, and the “Drop”, when you right-click an item, won’t drop the item. So drop won’t work. ANd you have to use ::empty or something ;[

Does anybody have a the working “drop” code, thats compatable with Project Czar?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: I need urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

There is a tutorial on how to block users from making accounts with characters such as /,.- etc.

Read full topic
